summary: Iteration 48 - Employee Management 7-Tab Form and Bulk Import Testing. All features verified successfully. Employee form has 7 tabs (Basic Info, Personal, ID & Docs, Qualification, Bank & Salary, Contact, Login Access). Bulk Import button added to Employee Management page. Students page Bulk Import still working.

success_rate.backend: N/A (skipped per request - tested in iteration_47)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Employee Management page has been enhanced with 7-tab form and Bulk Import button. All tabs working correctly: Basic Info (Name, Designation, Department, Mobile, Email, Joining Date), Personal (Gender, DOB, Blood Group, Marital Status, Father Name, Spouse Name, Address), ID & Docs (Aadhar, PAN, Voter ID, Driving License, UAN, ESI Number), Qualification (Highest Qualification, Specialization, Experience, Previous Employer), Bank & Salary (Monthly Salary, Salary Type, PF/ESI/TDS checkboxes, Bank details), Contact (Emergency Contact), Login Access (Role, Login checkbox, Password, Permissions). Bulk Import works on both Employee and Students pages.

employee_management_page_loads.details: Page loads correctly with employee list showing 6 employees

bulk_import_button_employee.details: Bulk Import button visible in header, opens dialog with Download Template CSV and file upload area

add_employee_button.details: Add Employee button opens form dialog

employee_form_7_tabs.details: All 7 tabs present and switching works correctly

basic_info_tab.details: All fields present with Hindi translations

personal_tab.details: All fields present with Hindi translations

qualification_tab.details: All qualification fields present with Hindi translations

bank_salary_tab.details: Salary and bank details sections present with checkboxes for PF/ESI/TDS

login_access_tab.details: Login access configuration present with role selection and permissions

tab_switching.details: All tabs switch correctly without errors

bulk_import_students_page.details: Bulk Import button still works on Students page
